com.playernguyen.optecoprime.database

Interface UserController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserControllerMongodb, UserControllerSQL

    public interface UserController
    Controls your data from database via Bukkit server. This class receives all data, push a new item, and even remove something if necessary. However, this controller should be in READ-WRITE (not DELETE) mode.

      • updatePlayer

           throws java.lang.Exception
        Update new persist data of player. If player are not found, throws NullPointerException.
        Parameters:
        uuid - a player uuid to update
        balance - an amount to update
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - any exception when querying

      • getHighestBalancePlayer

        java.util.Optional<OptEcoPlayer> getHighestBalancePlayer(int offset)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a player has the highest point with offset. For example,
        • Player 1 - 100
        • Player 2 - 97
        • Player 3 - 96

        If offset is 1, means take a Player 2 and ignore Player 1 or higher.
        Parameters:
        offset - an index offset to ignore higher point.
        Returns:
        a player who has the highest point.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - errors

      • getHighestBalancePlayers

        java.util.List<OptEcoPlayer> getHighestBalancePlayers(int limit)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves and responses a player list that contains highest players balance.
        Parameters:
        limit - limit a response
        Returns:
        a highest balance player list
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - errors
